parameters.name: Process
parameters.description: True to set the indication of welding process flag, false to not

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: Text related to the indication of welding process

parameters.name: Reference
parameters.description: True to place a reference box around the process text, false to not

title: IWeldSymbol.SetProcess
description: Sets the values related to the indication of welding process for this weld symbol.
signature:
System.Boolean SetProcess( 
   System.Boolean
Process
,
   System.String
Text
,
   System.Boolean
Reference
)

parameters.name: Process
parameters.description: True to set the indication of welding process flag, false to not

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: Text related to the indication of welding process

parameters.name: Reference
parameters.description: True to place a reference box around the process text, false to not

returns: True if the indication of welding process is set, false if not
remarks:
Get:
Flag that indicates whether the indication of welding process flag is set on this weld symbol using
IWeldSymbol::GetProcess
.
Text related to the indication of welding process using
IWeldSymbol::GetText
.
Flag that indicates whether a reference box exists around this text using
IWeldSymbol::GetProcessReference
.
The text and reference box are visible if Process is true.
